item.description:
I decided to put this event off until after the holidays but have been looking forward to this since the middle of November! One of our members, Dawn, recommended this restaurant. Here is what their website http://www.sallysfish... has to say:
"Critics say Hartford's newest restaurant is "off the hook". It is a blend of cool urban chic and New England Fish Camp.

I spoke with Debbie, the manager, and because we have a large group, we have to stick to a predetermined menu so the chef can prepare accordingly. Each person will pay $39, which includes tax and gratuity. The choices for food are as follows:

$39 per guest (inclusive of tax and gratuity)

First Course:
Mixed Greens tossed with julienne carrots, tomatoes, chopped cucumbers and balsamic vinaigrette
or
Caesar salad with fresh shaved parmesan, garlic croutons and camp?s Caesar dressing
or
New England Clam Chowder

Entrees:
Pan Seared Hanger Steak with garlic herb butter, fries, and baby carrots
or
Pine Nut & Parmesan crusted breast of chicken over mashed potatoes and haricot verts, with a garlic herb veloute
or
Dijon & Brown Sugar Glazed Salmon with haricot verts over wild rice
or
Linguini alla vongole: little neck clams steamed in parsley, olive oil, garlic, and white wine over linguini
or
New England Lobster Roll on a grilled top loader with drawn butter accompanied by Camp fries and slaw
or
Campfire Grilled Trout over wild rice and julienne vegetables in a tomato saffron mussel broth


Dessert
Chocolate S?mores Tart
or
Vanilla Bean Crème Brulée
or
Warm Apple Cranberry Tart topped with walnuts with house-made cinnamon ice cream

Coffee or soda


Please keep an eye on your RSVP. If you cannot attend or are not sure, please don't RSVP. I have a feeling that a lot of people will want to attend this event. Let's make sure that everyone who RSVPs actually comes.
item.how_to_find_us: We have a reservation under Kelly. I believe we will have our own room.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Finally...Sally's Fish Camp
